title: Breakdown of the Department of Homeland Security budget by organization 2020
yAxis: Budget authority in million U.S. dollars
summary: This statistic shows the amount spent on fresh soup in the united kingdom ( UK ) from 2007 to 2013 . In the 52 week period ending on the 2nd of 2007 , 78 million British pounds was spent on fresh soup in the UK , which had increased to 133 million British pounds in the period ending on the 30th of 2018 . There has been a declining trend in the value of soup and broths imported into the country .

data.Organisation: United States Citizenship and Immigration Services

gold: This statistic gives a breakdown of how the budget of the Department of Homeland is allocated amongst the various organizations administered by the agency in FY 2020 . The second budget of President Trump in FY 2020 saw funding for U.S. Customs and Border Protection increase by around 4.16 billion dollars from the 2018 figure to 20.85 billion U.S. dollars .
